meanings.definition: Lack of an adequate quantity or quality
meanings.sent1: The insufficiencies in the report made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: The insufficiencies in the food supply caused a lot of problems.
meanings.sent3: The insufficiencies in the cake recipe led to a very flat dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her insufficiencies in time management were like holes in a sinking ship.
meanings.sent5: The insufficiencies in the plan were glaringly obvious to everyone.

meanings.sent1: We need to address the insufficiencies in our budget.
meanings.sent2: The insufficiencies in his skills were holding him back.
meanings.sent3: The insufficiencies in the joke made it fall flat.
meanings.sent4: The insufficiencies in her argument were like missing puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The insufficiencies in the system were causing major delays.
